subject: Attention please
body:
Attention please
This is Mr. Honey Louis From Polaris Bank Limited Badagry I am glad to
inform you that your total funds of $4.8 million USD was deposited
here in my Bank on  22nd October. 2021, with your files from the
Federal Government Custody  and I went through your files and
discovered that it has been in the Federal Government Custody for two
years So I
want you to get back to me as soon as possible so we can discuss on
how you want your funds to be delivered to you . The three ways by
which you can receive your funds are listed below so i want you to
read them carefully and get back to me with the one you prefer.
1. Online Banking _i will open a online bank account in your name and
deposit your funds in your online account then send you the username
and password and 
it will only cost you sum of $90 USD Only
.
2. ATM CARD Delivery_i will credit your total funds into an ATM card
and it will be delivered to your home address by any Delivery company
of your choice within 48 hours and 
it will only cost you sum of $50
USD Only
3. Bank to Bank Transfer, i will wire your total fund to your account
and 
it will only cost you sum of $100 USD Only
 So get back to me now
with your choice so we can proceed
Best Regards,
Mr Honey Louis
cashier Polaris Bank Limited Badagry

subject: Re: Attention please
body:
Hello Mr. Honey Louis,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding my funds. It's interesting to hear that they have been in the Federal Government Custody for two years.

I would like to know more about the process and ensure that everything is legitimate. Could you please provide me with some additional details? Specifically, I would like to understand how the online banking option works and what steps are involved in setting up the account. Additionally, if I choose the ATM card delivery option, could you explain how the delivery process works and which delivery company would be used?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John
